text: Barnabás Hevesy (born 26 April 1950) is a Hungarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Barnabás Hevesy
